title: Middlekauff – 3 and Out - Carolina's future with Cam; Goff's growing pains; Khalil Mack's impact; Wentz's injuries piling up; Darnold vs. Barkley pick
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 and Out - Carolina's future with Cam; Goff's growing pains; Khalil Mack's impact; Wentz's injuries piling up; Darnold vs. Barkley pick
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the Saints MNF win over the Panthers, Carolina's future with Cam Newton, Jared Goff's late season struggles, how Khalil Mack has elevated the entire Bears organization, why Carson Wentz's injury history is a problem, and why the Giants should have drafted Sam Darnold over Saquon Barkley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
